FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Come on Niko man. Get out of here. Let's go. Come on!
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~好了，Niko兄弟。离开这儿吧。我们走。走吧！

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~If Dimitri and Pegorino are so on top, why would they care about me?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~要是Dimitri和Pegorino都有这么大权势了，还担心我干嘛？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Ya man ya man. How'de ginnal get away from you anyway, Niko? Me tink ya get dat boy for sure.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~好，兄弟，好，兄弟。那骗子怎么可能躲过你？我觉得你肯定能逮着那崽子。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~How you know he's going back to Pegorino and Dimitri? Why would he lead us back to them?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~你怎么知道他会去找Pegorino和Dimitri？他真会把我们引过去？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~De boy leading us back because him tink him boys going fe tear us to pieces and ting.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他把我们带过去是因为他觉得他的人足以把我们撕成碎片。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~A snake always be a snake, ya know rasta. Dimitri woulda steal from him own mother fe get ahead, ya know.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~叛徒永远都是叛徒懂吧，兄弟。Dimitri为了目标连他母亲都敢偷。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Come on, why does this take so long? Where are these idiots hiding out?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~真是，怎么要花这么久？那些蠢蛋到底躲在哪儿？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Roman was a gambler, he would've liked those odds.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Roman是个赌徒，他会喜欢那些可能性的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~We catch him, then we kill him, then we decide what to do with the body. How's that sound, Jacob?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~先逮住他，再杀了他，然后再决定怎么处理尸体。这样如何，Jacob？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Alright, so this guy is taking us to his bosses. We cannot kill him yet then.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~好了，既然这家伙会带我们找到他的老板，暂时就不能杀他。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Dimitri tinks dat you forget about what happen on the docks ya know, in Broker. Him screw ya over after ya kill Faustin for him.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Dimitri觉得你把Broker码头的那件事给忘了。你替他杀了Faustin，他却出卖了你。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I had to fight through a lot of people to get to Dimitri.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我必须得杀出一条血路才能靠近Dimitri。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Yo Niko, Dimitri and Pegorino gwan have mad firepower pon di ground, ya know. Dis ain't gwan be easy.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~哟，Niko，Dimitri和Pegorino肯定会在周边布置大量的火力懂吧。不会那么容易的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~No, Dimitri killed Pegorino when I arrived. I don't think he likes to share.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~不，我到的时候Dimitri就杀了Pegorino。我想他不喜欢和人分享。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Don't worry, rasta. I gwan shoot him out de blood clot sky. He ain't going to be able to talk his way outta dis.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~别担心，兄弟。我这就让他在天上血妈爆炸。他没法再用花言巧语骗出生路了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Dem ras clots tink dem are de dons of dons.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~那俩白痴以为自己是大佬中的大佬。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Tink about how ya gwan mash dem up when time ya find out which part dem a hide.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~想想找到他们的藏身处以后要怎么粉碎他们吧。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Seen Niko, a whole heap a bodies left inna dat place dere, ya know? Ya a real lion for real, ya know, star?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~懂了，Niko，那里留着一大堆尸体是吧？你真是头雄狮，知道吗，老兄？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~That's just the way Roman was. Don't ever forget him, seen?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Roman他就是这样的。永远不要忘记他，好吧？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~A leopard don't change him spots, ya know, Niko.
~z~You were there when Dimitri first wronged me.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Dimitri第一次背叛我的时候你也在。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~True me breda, true. I ain't gwan fe let it go neither.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~确实，兄弟，确实。我也不会就这样放着不管。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Maybe we should go with Dimitri's body. Bury him in his homeland.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~也许我们应该带上Dimitri的尸体过去。把他埋在故乡。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I had the opportunity to settle my score with Dimitri the other day but I chose not to take it.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~之前我就有机会和Dimitri把账算清，但我没有行动。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Dimitri and Pegorino, they be pon top after that deal, ya know. They got de coil and de brown, didn't dey?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Dimitri和Pegorino，他俩在那次交易后就上位了。他们既有钱又有货，不是吗？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I just want to drive this scum off of the road and smash his brain out on the concrete.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我现在就想撞飞这个人渣，再轧到他脑浆涂地。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I let it eat out everything good in me. It took me over.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我任由它吞食了身上的一切正念。它占据了我。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Yo Niko, ya need fe lose some of dis anger, ya know, before ya go after dem boy dere.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~哟，Niko，在跟着他们找到人之前你还是先消消气比较好。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I think he probably did. We'd have to go to Russia to find out though.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我想也是。不过我们得去俄罗斯才能查证。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Me tink dem be afraid of ya, ya know, me breda.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我觉得他们还是怕你，好兄弟。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~We haffi get to dem, so we follow dis bumba clot, seen?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我们必须找到他们，所以才跟着这个小杂种，懂？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~They could not hide anywhere that would keep me away from them.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他们藏到哪儿都是逃不掉的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I can tell him getting nervous, ya know, Niko. He's driving different. We must be getting close.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我敢肯定他慌了，Niko。他的开车风格变了。我们肯定很接近了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~No matter what you say about dat murderer, he's consistent. He's consistently fucking anybody him can.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~无论你怎么评价那个杀人犯，他都是一样的。他一直都是能搞谁搞谁。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Yeah, I understand. I get it. I just need those bastards to know and understand what they did to me.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~是，我明白。我懂的。我只是要让那些混蛋明白，知道自己到底对我做了什么。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Anyting could happen if you kill Dimitri pon dat day.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~就算你当时把Dimitri杀了，也不能保证之后会发生什么。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I did not forget about this, but I let it slide in the interest of business.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我没有忘，只是出于利益考量没去计较而已。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Me want get dem bumba clot dem too, ya know.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我也想干了那群狗杂种懂吗。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Had I got rid of Dimitri then, the bloodshed would have ended.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~要是我那会儿就杀了Dimitri，这些杀戮就已经结束了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Also, dey ain't going to know their boy at the wedding didn't do his job properly. They tink ya dead, ya know.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~还有，他们都不知道派去婚礼的杀手没办成事。当你已经死了，懂吗？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Dere ain't no guarantee you gonna make it, bredren. I and I don't know what our actions can do and ting.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~没人能保证你会成功，兄弟。我们也不知道我们的选择会有什么后果。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Sending an assassin after me and killing Roman on his wedding day, this is something I will not ignore.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~派杀手来杀我，还在Roman的大喜之日杀了他。这，才是我不能坐视不理的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~He stabbed Pegorino in the back, just like he did to everyone he has worked with while I have known him.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他背叛了Pegorino，就像他对他的所有合伙人做的一样，我已经很清楚了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~There ain't no way those boys gonna be scared of some boys like I and I following their boy, ya know.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他们也不会怕手下被我们跟踪懂吗。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Dem boy dey no right ya know, Come inna church and come kill a man pon him wedding day. Jah know, it ain't right.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~那几个小子不做好事懂吧。冲进教堂，冲进去把婚礼的新郎给杀了。主知道那是不对的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~He was beaten because of me, he was shot, his business and his home were burnt down.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他因为我的缘故被打，挨了枪子，他的家和事业都成了焦土。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Well then I am looking forward to disappointing his expectations.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我也很期待能让他大失所望。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Who dat inna de helicopter? Did Dimtri and Pegorino both leave when you get inna de ground?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~那架直升机里是谁？你进去的时候Dimitri和Pegorino是不是都跑了？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~So dem man dem haffi hide out for real.
~z~Seen, think about how you going to bust these bitches up then.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~懂了，那就想想你要怎么干烂这些贱人吧。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I cannot allow that to happen again, not to me, not to Mallorie and everyone who loved Roman.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我不能让那种悲剧重演，在我身上，在Mallorie身上，在任何爱着Roman的人身上都不能重演。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I'm going to catch Dimitri and end this for good.
~z~Me feeling dat, ya know, breda, I and I gwan get him.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~深有同感，懂吧，兄弟，我们要干了他。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~If he did, ya know, say him boss don' have long fe live 'pon this earth.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~要是他懂，就会说他的老板活不了多久了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Roman brought me to this city and I was nothing but a curse to him.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Roman让我来到这个城市，而我于他完全就是灾厄。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I have finally learnt this lesson. It has taken the death of my cousin, but it is something I must accept.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我终于明白了这个道理。以我堂兄的死为代价，但我也必须得接受。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~All we can be tinking about is taking dat ras clot down, and stopping him from hurting anyone else. Seen?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我们现在能考虑的就是干掉那个狗杂种，让他不能再伤害任何人。懂？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~We must find Dimitri and Pegorino and end all this.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我们必须找到Dimitri和Pegorino，给一切画上句号。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Instead I did the business deal that lead to Roman getting killed.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~反而去进行了交易，害得Roman被杀。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I don't tink you have a choice about dat, ya know, Niko. Roman loved you.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我想这你也没得选，Niko。Roman一直爱你。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Did you get Pegorino back at de place, bredren?
~z~Dimitri and Pegorino will find this out as well,
~z~Easy Niko, just be cool now. Pegorino and Dimitri be splitting up de large amount of money dem get from de business deal.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~放松，Niko，现在先冷静。Pegorino和Dimitri正在分配那次交易的巨额钱款。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Roman should be in his marriage bed.
~z~Ya mind be clouded and ya don't be able fe tink clearly, ya know. Ya want some weed?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~头脑不清就没法好好思考，懂吧。要来点草吗？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Me understand ya know, rasta. It's a good ting dat blood clot don't know you as good as I and I know ya, ya know?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我明白，兄弟。幸好那个狗逼没我那么了解你，懂吗？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~they will find it out when they stare down the barrel of my gun.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~等他们注视着我的枪口的时候就会明白了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~He was kidnapped. I should have known that the lives of those close to me would be destroyed.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~被人绑架。我早该知道亲近我的人的生活都会被破坏。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~He was a good man. No matter what happened to him, he would never be angry or upset for more than a minute.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他是个好人。无论遇到什么，他都不会愤怒或者伤心多久。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Everybody in Liberty City know dat, so dem after de money too.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~自由城人尽皆知，很多人都盯上了这钱。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~You are right, but we can change what is about to happen.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~你说的对，但我们可以改变将要发生的事。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~We can make sure that Roman's life is not the only one that is lost today.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我们可以做到让Roman不是唯一一个在今天没命的人。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I came to this city wanting revenge, I let that desire build up inside of me for many years.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我怀着复仇的心来到这座城市，我已经任由那种欲望在心中生长很多年了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~To get them back for what they have done, I would look for them in every corner of the earth.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~要让他们为自己的行为付出代价，我会寻找到天涯海角。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Seen, we just need fe stay on dis bumba clot and we'll be able to mash dem up real good.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~懂了，我们只要跟住这个杂种，就能把他们彻底粉碎。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~If there was any way I could change my actions so that he would not die, I would do it.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~要是有什么办法能改变我的选择，保住他的性命，我一定会去做的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~If you didn't wanna come up here, he was gonna go to Europe and drag you pon a boat.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~就算你不想来这儿，他也会去欧洲拉着你上船过来。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Dat was a long time ago, ya know, king. Dere ain't no promise dat life would be any different from now, ya know.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~那是很久以前了，兄弟。而且也没法保证那样就会和现在有什么区别。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Jah know not many man could a got through dem boys, ya know, star. Ya a real badman for real, real badman!
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~主也知道很少有人能杀出这样的血路懂吧，老兄。你真是个大恶人，真真正正的恶人！

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Ya man, we getting closer. Me hear from me source dat Pegorino might be inna di north of Alderney.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~喂老兄，我们很近了。我听线人说Pegorino可能就在Alderney的北部。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I will not forget him. Nor will I let these men forget him.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我不会忘记他的。我也不会让这些人忘记他的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I will put a bullet in his heart for every life he ruined,
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我会在他胸口开洞，他每毁掉一个人一枪，

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~What's done is done, and dere ain't no way to change what happen earlier.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~木已成舟，没有什么办法能够改变已经发生的事。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~A man stab you in the back once, him gonna keep stabbing until di job is done, seen?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~背叛过你的人永远都会背叛你，直到双方做个了断，懂？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Roman was a good man, ya know. He had a righteous heart, ya know, star. Jah know him in a better place now.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Roman是个好人，懂吧。他的心肠很好，懂吧，老兄。主知道他现在在更好的地方。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Dat be a whole heap of teeth, ya know, Niko. I don't tink we have enough ammo fe shoot him dat many times, ya know.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~那可得打上不少子弹，Niko。我觉得我们的子弹还不够打那么多次。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Are we getting near to them or is this man taking us on a tour around Alderney?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我们有接近他们吗？还是说这人在带我们参观Alderney？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I guess I'll just have to pass the time by thinking about how much I'm going to punish these scum.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我大概得靠思考如何惩治这些小人消磨这段时间了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I do this for my cousin and for his wife. I needed to make Dimitri pay.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我这么做是为了我的堂兄和他的妻子。我要让Dimitri付出代价。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Roman did not deserve to die. Not on this day, not in that place.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~Roman不应该死的。不该在此日，不该在彼处。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~We not angry at him, ya know, Niko. Its di people he's working for, seen?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~别对他发火，Niko。要发也对他的老板发，懂？

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~No matter what he was gonna get close to ya. Because, before you come all him a do is talk about him cousin, Niko.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~不论亲近你会带来什么。因为在你来前，他最常做的事就是谈论他的堂弟Niko。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Perhaps one bullet in his brain will have to do then.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~看来必须得给他的头上来一枪了。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~You betrayed everyone who ever came in contact with you.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~你背叛了所有和你有往来的人。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~the survival of the fittest thing really meant a lot to you.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~你一定很相信适者生存这句话。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I thought the money would help Roman and the people I loved.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我以为那笔钱能帮上Roman和我所爱的人。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I an' I gwan find dem, we going to find dem and take dem out, for real, dat's what we doing for Roman.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~一定能找到他们的，找到以后就是斩草除根了，这就是我们要为Roman做的。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I do not need any marijuana, Jacob. I can think clearly enough.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我不需要大麻，Jacob。我现在就能好好思考。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~I can't believe I did that deal with Dimitri. How could I trust him? I'm a fool.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~我都不敢相信我居然会帮Dimitri去交易。我怎么会相信他的？我就是个白痴。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Nuh, man. I and I do dis for Roman.
~z~Dey say a dying animal is de most dangerous inna de jungle, ya know, cousin. So, ya better be careful.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他们说濒死的野兽是丛林里最危险的生物懂吧，老弟。所以最好小心点。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~We leave him out for de dogs and crows.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~把他扔着喂野狗和乌鸦就行。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Yes, but the chances of my cousin being dead would be much slimmer.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~确实，但我堂兄死掉的可能性会小很多。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Okay, this is good news. I do not know how much of this driving I can continue to do.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~好的，是个好消息。不知道这种追车我还能忍多久。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~If we had got him then, Roman would still be alive. Things would be good.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~要是我们在那时就杀了他，Roman现在就还活着，一切都会很好。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~for every agreement he went back on, for every friend he betrayed.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~每与人达成一个协议一枪，每背叛一个伙伴一枪。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Cha! A burial be too good for that bumba clot, ya know. He ain't worth putting inna di ground, ya know, star.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~擦！那狗逼根本不配下葬懂吧。他不值得被葬在地下，懂吧老兄。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Just be calm now, rasta. Just make sure ya don't lose dat blood clot.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~先保持冷静，兄弟。别跟丢那个狗逼就行。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~He has reason to be nervous, the man who will kill his employer is following him.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他是该慌了，要杀他老板的人现在就跟着他。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~He had many men there. Both Russians and Pegorino's men.
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~他在那儿安排了不少人。俄国人和Pegorino的手下都有。

FIN1DBA.original: ~z~Why would they bother to send a hitman to the wedding?
FIN1DBA.translated: ~z~为什么还不惜在婚礼时派出杀手？
